metadata.title: CVE-2023-52824 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:kernel: watch_queue: copy user-array safelyCurrently, there is no overflow-check with memdup_user().Use the new function memdup_array_user() instead of memdup_user() forduplicating the user-space array safely.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
